t: Amazon Salary Levels and New Pay Bands in 2024 - Interviewjoy, Inc.
s: July 1, 2024 - Amazon Levels (also affects the Amazon Salary Levels) are internal company designations to its employee’s ranks. They range from Level 1 to Level 12, with only the CEO being Level 12. There is no Level 9 at Amazon (more info below!).

t: Insights into Amazon’s Compensation Philosophy & Salary Negotiation Tactics | Carrus.io
s: Every role at Amazon is categorized into compensation levels, which all have a salary range associated with them. There are 12 levels at Amazon. Full-time workers who are entering the workforce start at Level 4 with a salary range of $50,000-$70,000 per year.
